output_list.criticism: The mintToken function uses the random.seed function, which has no randomness, resulting in predictable outcomes.
The mintToken function is publicly accessible, allowing unauthorized users to create tokens for arbitrary users.
The sell function is accessed by unauthorized users, allowing unauthorized users to create tokens for arbitrary users.
The sell function has an integer overflow where the amount of the sell price is used to increase the balance of the user who is selling.
The mintToken function has an integer overflow where the balance of the user is increased when the token is created.
